title: Snubbed no more: Trump to invite Philadelphia Eagles to the White House
shortDescription: During his first term in office, Trump abruptly disinvited the Eagles on the eve of their planned trip in 2018.

title: White House to control press access to Trump
shortDescription: The Trump Administration announced they will decide which news outlets have access to the president, not the White House Correspondents' Association.

title: Elon Musk to attend Trump's first Cabinet meeting, White House says
shortDescription: Elon Musk is set to attend President Trump's first Cabinet meeting of his second term Wednesday in a display of Musk's enormous influence.

title: White House says it will control press access to Trump, not reporters
shortDescription: The White House says it will decide which news outlets have access to the president, ripping power away from an independent group of journalists.

title: Fraud complaints unanswered after Trump purge, Dems say
shortDescription: Since its founding, the CFPB has returned more than $21 billion to consumers who were victims of fraud or scams.

title: UN Security Council adopts neutral US stance on war in Ukraine
shortDescription: Plus: President Donald Trump met with French President Emmanuel Macron. | A judge blocks ICE enforcement actions at houses of worship.

title: US abstains in Ukraine resolution vote
shortDescription: The U.S. abstained from the vote of a United Nations resolution to condemn Russia's war against Ukraine on the war's third anniversary.

title: Watch: Donald Trump's lengthy handshake with France's Macron
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and France President Emmanuel Macron shared a lengthy handshake at the White House to discuss Russia's war on Ukraine.

title: Is the US government facing a constitutional crisis? | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Critics of the president are calling it a constitutional crisis. Is that true and what does a constitutional crisis really mean?

title: Europe's Trump-whisperer makes the case for Ukraine
shortDescription: Trump has horrified European allies with his attacks on Volodymyr Zelenskyy and what critics say is a soft take on Vladimir Putin.

title: How Trump's expanded ICE raids are causing problems for schools
shortDescription: What hurts school children more, threats of federal raids or more immigrant kids in class?

title: Is the US government facing a constitutional crisis?
shortDescription: What happens when one of the three branches of government seizes power and authority from another?

title: Trump team vs. Elon Musk: Personnel office reverses DOGE order
shortDescription: The Office of Personnel Management told workers replying to billionaire Elon Musk's questions about their job accomplishments was 'voluntary.'
